name: People Performance
description: People Performance International was born with the spirit of helping people to get to know themselves better through assessments that promote personal and professional development as well as the alignment of the person with the job position most appropriate to their personality style. However, the foundations behind the project began to be forged many years earlier through the experience and development of its founders. In 2012 we developed a global vision and strategy, expanding especially to the South American and European markets and later also entering the African continent. Nowadays we are a company in constant growth with the firm conviction that we can have a global scope as well as a local presence, and for this we have developed a strong international structure of Agents and Distributors that ensure our proximity to the end customer from the power of a global company.

Headline: The most effective assessment platform for talent recruitment and development
ShortDescription: People Performance International was born with the spirit of helping people to get to know themselves better through assessments that promote personal and professional development as well as the alignment of the person with the job position most appropriate to their personality style.
enhanced_description: People Performance International offers an assessment platform designed to facilitate personal and professional development and optimize job-person alignment. Their solutions support talent recruitment and development initiatives by helping individuals understand themselves better through assessments. The platform aims to accelerate skill development, improve learning efficiency, boost employee happiness and engagement, and foster a more diverse and inclusive workforce. It provides key features such as customizable reports with branding options, domain access to assessments, and multiple user administration with varied management permissions. Accessible 24/7 from any computer or mobile device, People Performance has expanded globally, serving South American, European, and African markets since 2012, operating with a strong international structure of Agents and Distributors to ensure global scope with local customer proximity.
